confuns 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Normalize numeric values

    normalize.Rd

    Scales the values of the provided vector to values between 0 and 1.

    normalize(x)

    Arguments

    x

    A numeric vector.

    Value

    A numeric with the same length as x.

    Examples

    purrr::map_df(.x = mtcars[,sapply(mtcars, is.numeric)],
              .f = normalize)
#> # A tibble: 32 x 11
